title: Emerging Markets Starting Bull Cycle: Jamison
description: Thea Jamison, founder and managing director of CHANGE Global, says the firm believes emerging markets are still in the early stages of a cycle, citing improving fundamentals, signs of shifting capital flows, and compelling valuations. She tells Katie Greifeld and Romaine Bostick on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
